notes.note: Locales added: English from Canada (en-CA), and Ligurian (lij)
App now targets Oreo with security and performance improvements and support for new features

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 63.0beta Beta
